type.markdownDescription:
The `@app` type is used to denote that this container accepts app blocks. [App blocks](/docs/themes/architecture/sections/app-blocks) enable app developers to create blocks for merchants to add app content to their theme without having to directly edit theme code.

---

[Shopify reference](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/architecture/blocks/app-blocks#supporting-app-blocks)
